config_options: Configuration Options (P0-22 will integrate real config)
config_placeholder: Target subtitle language, summary language, bilingual subtitle settings will be integrated in P0-22
eta_remaining: Estimated remaining time: ~{minutes} minutes (for reference only)
eta_remaining_seconds: Estimated remaining time: ~{seconds} seconds (for reference only)
concurrency_hint: (Default 3, recommended range 1-5, too high may cause rate limiting)
save_settings_hint: Note: After modifying concurrency, click "Save Settings" to apply
concurrency_too_low: Concurrency must be greater than 0, reset to 1
concurrency_high_warning: High concurrency setting ({value}) may cause IP blocking or 429 errors, use with caution
concurrency_medium_warning: Concurrency set to {value}, monitor network request frequency to avoid rate limiting
page_not_implemented:
Page: {page}
(Will be implemented in P0-22 and later tasks)
fetching_videos: Fetching video list (this may take some time)...
no_videos_found:
No videos found. Possible reasons:
1. Channel URL is incorrect or malformed
2. Cookie required for access (please add Cookie in config)
3. Network connection issue or timeout
4. yt-dlp execution failed (check log file for detailed error)
Tip: Check error messages in log file, or try adding Cookie in config
detection_complete: Detection complete: {has_count} with subtitles, {no_count} without subtitles
no_proxy: No proxy configured, using direct connection
ai_client_init_failed: AI client initialization failed, will skip translation and summary features: {error}
cookie_placeholder: Paste Cookie string copied from browser (format: key1=value1; key2=value2; ...)
cookie_test_success: Cookie test successful: Cookie is available
cookie_help:
How to get Cookie:
1. Open browser, visit YouTube
2. Press F12 to open Developer Tools
3. Switch to Network tab
4. Refresh page, find any request
5. Find Cookie field in request headers
6. Copy entire Cookie string and paste here
proxy_placeholder:
One proxy address per line, supports http:// or socks5:// format
Example:
http://proxy.example.com:8080
socks5://proxy.example.com:1080
proxy_test_requires_requests: Proxy test requires requests library, please install: pip install requests
proxy_test_socks_required: SOCKS proxy requires PySocks library, please run: pip install pysocks or pip install requests[socks]
ai_api_keys_label: API Keys (one per line, format: provider=env:VAR_NAME or provider=key_value)
subtitle_target_languages_hint: One language code per line, e.g.: zh-CN, en-US
summary_language_hint: (Requires configuring Summary AI in "Translation & Summary" page)
translation_strategy_hint: (Requires configuring Translation AI in "Translation & Summary" page)
translation_strategy_official_auto_then_: Prioritize official/auto subtitles, use AI if unavailable
translation_strategy_official_only: Only use official multilingual subtitles, no AI
processing_complete_with_errors: Processing complete: {success} succeeded, {failed} failed. Check error log above for details.
url_list_hint: Tip: One video URL per line, can mix channel/playlist/single video URLs
url_list_empty: URL list is empty, please enter at least one URL
dry_run_start_url_list: Starting Dry Run detection (URL List Mode)
deduplicate_complete_message: Deduplication complete: Removed {removed} duplicate URLs, {remaining} remaining
no_duplicates_found: Deduplication complete: No duplicate URLs found
url_list_already_empty: URL list is already empty, no need to clear
no_urls_in_file: No valid YouTube URLs found in file
force_rerun_hint: When checked, all videos will be reprocessed even if previously processed
force_rerun_enabled: Force re-run mode enabled: will ignore history and reprocess all videos
retry_count_hint: Auto-retry count for retryable errors like network errors and rate limits (0-10)
run_params_updated: Run parameters updated: concurrency {concurrency}, retry count {retry_count}
channel_id_hint: Enter channel ID to clear its incremental records
clear_archive_confirm:
Are you sure you want to clear incremental records for channel {channel_id}?

This action cannot be undone and will cause all videos from this channel to be reprocessed.
clear_archive_failed: Failed to clear incremental records for channel {channel_id}
clear_all_archive_confirm:
Are you sure you want to clear all incremental records?

This action cannot be undone and will cause all videos to be reprocessed.
delete_archive_file_failed: Failed to delete incremental record file {file}: {error}
source_language_auto_hint: (Check "Auto" for priority: en > zh-CN > ja > de..., uncheck to manually specify)
target_language_hint: (Enter language code, e.g.: zh-CN, zh-TW, en, ja, ko, de)
